Row.Text: Our people are utterly obsessed with flags! Flags here! Banners there! I'm so sick of it! Couldn't you have chosen someone else to eclipse in culture?!

We have conquered foreign lands of great wealth and prestige. Let us reform our empire to match the glory of the lands we have acquired.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Manchu [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have conquered 2 [ICON_CAPITAL] Capitals or 5 cities [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A 15 turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age starts. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Empire is renamed to Qing

We have conquered foreign lands of great wealth and prestige. Let us reform our empire to match the glory of the lands we have acquired.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A 15 turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age starts. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Civ is renamed the "Qing Dynasty."

We must enforce order over our conquered subjects. To do so, we will implement a system where every foreign subject must maintain their hair in a queue, lest they face punishment by death.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Manchu [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be in at least the Renaissance [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrate [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Courthouses are built 100% faster and yield +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.

We must enforce order over our conquered subjects. To do so, we will implement a system where every foreign subject must maintain their hair in a queue, lest they face punishment by death.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Courthouses are built 100% faster and yield +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
{1_LeaderName} has received the Mandate of Heaven and declared themself Emperor of the Qing Dynasty!
